attributes.action: Get Ms Roberts back to RHS!!!
attributes.additional_details: Since september last year Ridgeway High School has lost an unacceptable amount of teaching staff. some staff had to re-apply for their existing jobs and missed out!! I for one have had enough of them messing with my childrens education and the ONLY way things will get put right is if Ms Roberts returns to her rightful place....OUR HEAD Please sign
